summary: Survivors of a plane crash on a remote island find it is covered by spiders. When bitten, the survivors start turning into spiders!
cast: Harald Maresch|Helga Franck|Alexander D'Arcy|Helga Neuner|Rainer Brandt|Dorothee Parker|Gerry Sammer|Eva Schauland|Helma Vandenberg|Elfie Wagner|Barbara Valentin|Walter Faber
title: Ein Toter hing im Netz
